name: Urban Legend 3D: Escape the Room Full
name_original: Urban Legend 3D: Escape the Room Full
description:
Help these people survive and find a way out of the serial killer’s lair! You’re their only hope! Give right advice and human lives with Urban Legend 3D: Escape the Room!
You’ve to find this online translation by the accident – but now you’re the only hope of this poor victim of maniac trying to find her way out! Watch the movement of the victim and give hints and advice to her – location of the maniac, where to find a key, what door is locked or open and so on! Do your best to save the human life!
Enjoy this unusual reality show simulator and have fun! Help people, watch the movement of the maniac, solve puzzles and do your best to find the way out! Check your skills against different maniacs – crazy doctor, maddened butcher or demonic clown! Explore the hideout and different rooms like a safe house, operating theater, slaughterhouse and others! Collect tags to unlock other characters – each with unique abilities!
Emerge into the atmosphere of horror and slasher movies, do your best to escape from the maniac and have fun with Urban Legend 3D: Escape the Room!
Urban Legend 3D: Escape the Room features:
Ultimate thriller game!
Surveillance cameras to control your and maniac movement
Different serial killers
Unlockable characters
You find yourself in the den of slasher – he’s not Leatherface or Pennywise, but he wanna kill you! Run for your life with Urban Legend 3D: Escape the Room!
